testcase.name: T276.9-01: Buying a 4K EST title authorizes its HD-equivalent
testcase.summary:
[R-EST.64]

If the EST content is purchased as 4K content, the STB guide shall display both 4K and HD titles for that content.
 

Prerequisites:

-STB is connected to the Internet

-STB has acquired EST VO to enable EST - if VO is not on air, then smart search the keyword "MWCMD E5T ON" to enable EST

NOTE:

For purposes of these test cases the term "EST ONLY" means that the title is available for EST purchase only.

For purposes of these test cases the term "Rental ONLY" means that the title is available for rental only.

For purposes of these test cases the term "EST & Rental" means that the title is available for EST purchase and for rental.
testcase.steps:
1. Find an unpurchased 4K BBVOD (either "EST ONLY" or "EST & Rental") that also has an HD equivalent (with the same content ID).
You can select on titles on the 4K Homepage (1100 - 1104) or in a Smart Search for the 4K Category - if multiple versions of the title are available, they will be listed.

2. Download both the HD & 4K versions of the title.

3. Play the HD version of the title.

4. Play the 4K version of the title.

5. Buy the 4K title and view past the free preview period.

6. Play the HD title again.
testcase.expectedresults:
1. -

2. Both HD and 4K versions of the title appear in the Playlist.

3. Purchase offers OSD appears during playback and displays the text:

Purchase Options (OSD’s title)

<Title> | <Rating> | <Duration>

Buy $<Price>

The bottom right corner of the OSD displays the following buttons:

Buy $<Price> (highlighted by default)

Cancel

4. See Expected Result 3.

5. The following purchase OSD becomes displayed now:

Confirm Your Purchase: <Programs title> (OSD’s title)

Your purchase is available anytime, anywhere, as long as you remain a DIRECTV subscriber. Please visit directv.com/purchases for terms and conditions

The following purchase confirmation OSD should display:

Thank You! (OSD’s title)

<Title> has been added to the Purchases folder in your Playlist.

NOTE: This title will always be available in your purchases folder, even if you remove it from the Playlist.

- The 4K version of the title can be fully viewed and is listed in the Purchases menu (MENU -> Recordings -> Manage Recordings...)

- The 4K version of the title is listed in the Purchases folder of the Playlist.

- No "Rental Ends" text is seen in the Playlist entries and info screen for this 4K title.

6. The Purchase OSD does not appear and the title can be watched past the free preview period.

The HD version of the title is successfully authorized when the 4K version is Bought.

 

- No "Rental Ends" text is seen in the Playlist entries and info screen for this HD title.

You can select on titles on the VOD Homepage (1100 - 1104) or in a Smart Search for the 4K Category  - if multiple versions of the title are available, they will be listed.

2. Download both the HD & 4K versions of the title.

<Title> | <Rating> | <Duration>

Rent $<Price> - <rental duration in day(s)> day rental

The bottom right corner of the OSD displays the following buttons:

Rent $<Price> - <rental duration in day(s)> day (highlighted by default)

Cancel

4. See Expected Result 3.

<Title> has been added to the Purchases folder in your Playlist.

- The 4K version of the title can be fully viewed and is listed in the Purchases menu (MENU -> Recordings -> Manage Recordings...)

- The 4K version of the title is listed in the Purchases folder of the Playlist.

6. The Purchase OSD does not appear and the title can be watched past the free preview period.

The HD version of the title is successfully authorized when the 4K version is Rented.

testcase.name: T276.9-03: Buying an HD EST title does not authorize its 4K-equivalent
testcase.summary:
[R-EST.65]

Prerequisites:

-STB is connected to the Internet

-STB has acquired EST VO to enable EST - if VO is not on air, then smart search the keyword "MWCMD E5T ON" to enable EST

NOTE:

For purposes of these test cases the term "EST ONLY" means that the title is available for EST purchase only.

For purposes of these test cases the term "Rental ONLY" means that the title is available for rental only.

For purposes of these test cases the term "EST & Rental" means that the title is available for EST purchase and for rental.
testcase.steps:
1. Find an unpurchased 4K BBVOD (either "EST ONLY" or "EST & Rental") that also has an HD equivalent (with the same content ID).
You can select on titles on the 4K Homepage (1100 - 1104) or in a Smart Search for the 4K Category - if multiple versions of the title are available, they will be listed.

2. Download both the HD & 4K versions of the title.

3. Play the 4K version of the title.

4. Play the HD version of the title.

5. Buy the HD title.

6. Play the 4K title again.
testcase.expectedresults:
1. -

2. Both HD and 4K versions of the title appear in the Playlist.

3. Purchase offers OSD appears during playback and displays the text:

Purchase Options (OSD’s title)

<Title> | <Rating> | <Duration>

Buy $<Price>

The bottom right corner of the OSD displays the following buttons:

Buy $<Price> (highlighted by default)

Cancel

4. See Expected Result 3.

5. The following purchase OSD becomes displayed now:

Confirm Your Purchase: <Programs title> (OSD’s title)

Your purchase is available anytime, anywhere, as long as you remain a DIRECTV subscriber. Please visit directv.com/purchases for terms and conditions

The following purchase confirmation OSD should display:

Thank You! (OSD’s title)

<Title> has been added to the Purchases folder in your Playlist.

NOTE: This title will always be available in your purchases folder, even if you remove it from the Playlist.

- The correct HD version of the title is listed in the Purchases menu (MENU -> Recordings -> Manage Recordings...)

- The HD version of the title is listed in the Purchases folder of the Playlist.

6. The Purchase OSD still appears.

The 4K version of the title is not authorized when the HD version is Bought.
